alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln and Marathon Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rib Lake to near Medford to 7 miles southwest of Colby. Movement was east at 40 mph. These storms will be capable of producing isolated gusts up to 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Wood Wildlife Area around 920 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Merrill, Birch Trails Girl Scout Camp, Council Grounds State Park, Dutch Corners, Mosinee and Weston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
